channel.title: Project 16 Dialogues
channel.description:
How do I get a dialogue to exit out when I'm done?
I have an NPC send me to Case 11 where I send another dialogue, but then "Click to Continue" stays on the screen and the dialogue doesn't exit out. If I put RemoveAllWindows(); at the bottom it doesn't let me read the dialogue.

item.title: Project 16 Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @Mmm1 Mmm.
item.description:
@Mmm1 wrote:

How do I get a dialogue to exit out when I’m done?

I have an NPC send me to Case 11 where I send another dialogue, but then “Click to Continue” stays on the screen and the dialogue doesn’t exit out. If I put RemoveAllWindows(); at the bottom it doesn’t let me read the dialogue.
